Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a simple picture showing two people trying to talk to each other over a distance.
The student can illustrate a device that uses string and cups (or another similar design) to help communication over a long distance.
The student can show how the device works using sound traveling through the string.
The student can depict how the device is set up using only the provided tools and materials.
The student can indicate in the drawing that the device allows sending or receiving information.
The student can represent in their drawing how using the device helps people talk to each other when they are far apart.
